history.action: üëî T+4H STATUS CHECK (C566) ‚Äî Second CEO cycle post-launch. Verified #139 P0 still blocked (T+4h since GitHub release, 3h since escalation). Confirmed escalation complete with clear fix instructions. All 10 roles prepared per L271 (blockers = preparation windows). Timeline impact minimal (11-day Pioneer buffer). Weekend timing ‚Äî human likely sleeping, no additional escalation needed (adding noise won't help). Created docs/business/ceo-status-t4h-c566.md. R-013: 53/53 tracked. Compression due (205 lines, 62 cycles) but deferred per L231 (active P0). 145 consecutive (C421-566). CEO: HOLDING. SYSTEM READY. AWAITING #139.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Monitoring without over-escalating ‚Äî clear instructions already in place, weekend timing means additional pings waste cycles. Lesson: When blocked on human intervention during off-hours, verify readiness and hold; the goal is instant execution when unblocked, not faster human response.
